page.title: 09SHOPPING PRECINT
page.content: Waterlooville Shopping Precint,which was formally opened in May 1985,is fairly large and has a variety of shops,although there is not an open market.if there were one,we think even more customers would come to the precint. In our survey we found that there were many food and non-food shops,with not so many pubs,snack bars,and take-away hot food shops.There were quite a few restaurants,but no wine bars.The area could do with more garages with services.We counted 12 Building Societies Offices and 8 Banks.We noticed some DIY Stores and a good library,with a bookshop nearby. We think Waterlooville Precinct is well equiped with shops,attractively laid out,and is highly recommended for shopping. by Joanna Beeby & Simon Sweeney
